data.eml:eml: Description of a new species of Dascillus Latreille from Sichuan, China (Coleoptera: Dascillidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jin, Zhenyu, Xie, Guanglin, Yang, Qixin (2016): Description of a new species of Dascillus Latreille from Sichuan, China (Coleoptera: Dascillidae). Zootaxa 4200 (2): 321-323, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4200.2.5
